title: Any Ideas?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/files/elum_6559.jpg)

I like this, any idea what it is?  
I am looking for this kind of feel, so any similar font suggestions would work as well.

Thanks
author: ms. pater

comments.content:
Looks like “the good old” [Rotis](http://web.archive.org/web/20070309184102/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/agfa-rotis-sans-serif/) (the “eeeee” …)

-\> Agfa Rotis Sans Serif Light
